properties.entry: SELECT CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, COUNT FROM (SELECT CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, TB_CITY.NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, COUNT FROM TB_CITY JOIN TB_NATION ON(TB_CITY.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) ORDER BY COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 8
